title: The Waterboy
short_plot_summary: A socially awkward waterboy for a college football team discovers he has a unique tackling ability, becoming a member of the team and transforming their success.
explanation: Dang, a water droplet, 'cause that's my job - the waterboy for the football team, y'all!
This here's a football, the sport I end up playin' when I find out I got some fierce tacklin' skills!
Uh huh, that's me, Bobby Boucher, the main character who comes outta his mama's shadow and makes it big on the football field
Now, this here's an alligator symbolizing my love for alligators and, well, my mama says they're so angry 'cause they got all them teeth but no toothbrush
This pretty lady is Vicki Vallencourt, the girl who believes in me and... we kinda start likin' each other
